name: Cuckoo Labs
long_description:
Cuckoo is an AI interpreter for global teams. Cuckoo instantly learns the technical details of your conversation from your keywords and documents and translates into over 20 languagesâ€”customized for your specific industry and organization. It's like having an always-available in-house interpreter. 

Global teams like Snowflake, PagerDuty, Weights & Biases, dbt Labs, and SeAH rely on Cuckoo for multilingual meetings, events, business trips, and more.
